article.name: I want to delete a user account
article.title: I want to delete a user account
article.body:
• User accounts can be deleted by following this procedure.
  • If the user belongs to an organization, that user must leave all organizations in advance.
    • If the user is an owner of an organization, please transfer that authority to another user.
    • If no other users belong to the organization, please delete the organization.
